patthana21.52:1.1_0: Nasārammaṇaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anārammaṇo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana21.52:2.1_0: Naanārammaṇaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anārammaṇo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana21.52:3.1_0: (Anidassanasappaṭighe tīṇiyeva.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.52:4.1_0: Nasārammaṇaṁ naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anārammaṇo anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.52:5.1_0: Nocittaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocitto sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana21.52:6.1_0: Nanocittaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocitto sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana21.52:7.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.52:8.1_0: Nacetasikaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacetasiko sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.52:9.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.52:10.1_0: Nacittasampayuttaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittavippayutto sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.52:11.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.52:12.1_0: Nacittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittavisaṁsaṭṭho sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.52:13.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.52:14.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhānaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.52:15.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.52:16.1_0: Nocittasahabhuṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasahabhū sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.52:17.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.52:18.1_0: Nocittānuparivattiṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittānuparivattī sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.52:19.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.52:20.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.52:21.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.52:22.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.52:23.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.52:24.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattī sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.52:25.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.52:26.1_0: Naajjhattikaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bāhiro sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana21.52:27.1_0: Nabāhiraṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bāhiro sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana21.52:28.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.52:29.1_0: Noupādā nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca upādā sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.52:30.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
patthana21.52:31.1_0: Naupādinnaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anupādinno sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.52:32.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
